researched_ingredients: 4 to 6 tablespoons (50 to 65 grams) organic sugar

items.name: Basmati Rice
items.quantity: 250 grams (bulk purchase for ¼ cup needed)

shopping_tips: Buy rice and sugar in bulk from wholesale/discount stores to stay within budget—basmati rice and sugar are staple items with longer shelf lives
Skip saffron initially to reduce costs; the kheer will still be delicious with cardamom and sugar alone
Purchase cardamom pods from Indian spice markets rather than supermarkets for better prices
Check for store loyalty programs or bulk purchase discounts on milk and rice
Buy whole milk from local dairy vendors if available—often cheaper than packaged milk
Since nuts are excluded per dietary restrictions, no need to budget for almonds, cashews, or pistachios
Prepare ingredients the day before to ensure milk freshness and avoid last-minute shopping
The recipe yields 4-5 servings; store leftover kheer in the refrigerator for up to 2-3 days
For low sodium compliance, use unsalted cardamom and ensure milk has no added salt
